entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 2:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

Temperature: -3.4°C

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 90 %

Dewpoint: -4.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
